order by $orderByClause$

sqlMap.update: update TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY set ID = #id:VARCHAR#, ORDER_NO = #orderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:NUMBER#, ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:VARCHAR#, USER_ID = #userId:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID = #collectMoneyUserId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:VARCHAR#, REQUEST_ID = #requestId:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:NUMBER#, WORK_ORDER_NO = #workOrderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_SUBJECT = #orderSubject:VARCHAR#, REMARKS = #remarks:VARCHAR#, CLENT_TYPE = #clentType:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHANNEL = #payChannel:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #version:NUMBER#, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, PAY_ORDER_ID = #payOrderId:VARCHAR#, RECORD_CREATE_TIME = #recordCreateTime:NUMBER#, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #recordCreateSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_CATALOG = #productCatalog:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_NAME = #productName:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_DESC = #productDesc:VARCHAR#, CLENT_ID = #clentId:VARCHAR#, USER_UA = #userUa:VARCHAR#, USER_IP = #userIp:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_ID = #identityId:VARCHAR#, CALLBACK_URL = #callbackUrl:VARCHAR#, FCALLBACK_URL = #fcallbackUrl:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_TYPE = #identityType:NUMBER#, IS_CLEARING = #isClearing:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_STEP_NO = #businessStepNo:DECIMAL#, OWNER_USER_NO = #ownerUserNo:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY set ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#, ORDER_NO = #record.orderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:NUMBER#, ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:VARCHAR#, USER_ID = #record.userId:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID = #record.collectMoneyUserId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:VARCHAR#, REQUEST_ID = #record.requestId:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:NUMBER#, WORK_ORDER_NO = #record.workOrderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_SUBJECT = #record.orderSubject:VARCHAR#, REMARKS = #record.remarks:VARCHAR#, CLENT_TYPE = #record.clentType:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHANNEL = #record.payChannel:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #record.version:NUMBER#, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #record.serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, PAY_ORDER_ID = #record.payOrderId:VARCHAR#, RECORD_CREATE_TIME = #record.recordCreateTime:NUMBER#, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #record.recordCreateSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, ACCOUNT_NO = #record.accountNo:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #record.collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_CATALOG = #record.productCatalog:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_NAME = #record.productName:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_DESC = #record.productDesc:VARCHAR#, CLENT_ID = #record.clentId:VARCHAR#, USER_UA = #record.userUa:VARCHAR#, USER_IP = #record.userIp:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_ID = #record.identityId:VARCHAR#, CALLBACK_URL = #record.callbackUrl:VARCHAR#, FCALLBACK_URL = #record.fcallbackUrl:VARCHAR#, IDENTITY_TYPE = #record.identityType:NUMBER#, IS_CLEARING = #record.isClearing:VARCHAR#, BUSINESS_STEP_NO = #record.businessStepNo:DECIMAL#, OWNER_USER_NO = #record.ownerUserNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, REQUEST_ID, CREATE_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, ORDER_SUBJECT, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_ORDER_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, IDENTITY_TYPE, IS_CLEARING, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, OWNER_USER_NO from ( select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, REQUEST_ID, CREATE_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, ORDER_SUBJECT, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_ORDER_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, IDENTITY_TYPE, IS_CLEARING, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, OWNER_USER_NO, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, REQUEST_ID, CREATE_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, ORDER_SUBJECT, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_ORDER_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, IDENTITY_TYPE, IS_CLEARING, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, OWNER_USER_NO from ( select OUT.* , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, COLLECT_MONEY_USER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, REQUEST_ID, CREATE_TIME, WORK_ORDER_NO, ORDER_SUBJECT, REMARKS, CLENT_TYPE, PAY_CHANNEL, VERSION, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_ORDER_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_CATALOG, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CLENT_ID, USER_UA, USER_IP, IDENTITY_ID, CALLBACK_URL, FCALLBACK_URL, IDENTITY_TYPE, IS_CLEARING, BUSINESS_STEP_NO, OWNER_USER_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
) OUT )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID as ID , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select
$selectedField$ as ID
TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY.ID as ID
, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_ORDER_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
) )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$
